title: Workshop on Developing Self-Regulated Learning Strategies Based on a CMS

context.prior_knowledge: Basic CMS (Content Management System) usage and self-regulated learning concepts
context.additional_context: Course for pre-service/in-service teachers to acquire methods of applying CMS tools to language education projects in a limited technological environment centered on smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can classify and explain CMS tool functions according to language education objectives
Learners can design a project applying self-regulated learning strategies (goal-setting, monitoring, reflection) to CMS tool utilization
Learners can analyze efficient usage patterns of CMS tools in smartphone environments and propose improvements

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
